import React from 'react'; import '../privacy/Privacy.css' const PrivacyComponent = () =>

Mind-Assistant Privacy Policy

The privacy policy will help you to understand how and why we use the data you provide to us when you visit and use Mind-Assistant. We reserve the right to change this policy at any given time, of which you will be promptly updated. 1. What We Collect Any information gathered by us is used to customize the experience for the user and continually improve our design. Mind-Assistant collects information from you through: Account registration The note-taking service that you use Your search activities on the website They type of information gathered are: Contact information and email address University or Employer Notes and website behavior Other information such as interests and preferences 2. What we do with the Data We collect data for several reasons: Understanding your needs To improve the product To customize our website according to your behavior or personal preferences. 2a. University and Employer information may be utilized to understand the type of users the web site attracts in order to identify areas of growth or improvement. 2b. Your note-taking will allow us to understand the habits and interests of our users, allowing for insight into improvements to be made, experiences and features to be added and the demographics we have. 2c. Search data collected upon accessing the Dad Joke service is utilized to collect user behaviors and interests. This information helps in the understanding of our users so that we can enhance our services and understand our target demographics to expand our reach. 3. Why this is Reasonable While we work to respect your data and privacy, we feel we are using your data reasonably. We take every possible effort to conceal and protect your personal information. Using your information will allow us to grow a better and more enjoyable experience that you and future users can continue to enjoy. Your University or Employer information will allow for the understanding of what users enjoy the platform so that we can continue to expand or grow resources to enhance the continued use by those, but also seek understanding into why other users may not enjoy the experience. You, as the user, are continuously taking and saving notes which are collected by our service. While we protect this data from outside sources, we may reasonably use this data to get an overview of who users are and what interests they may have. This information will aid us in our constant goal of providing a better user experience. Understanding your habits and ideas will guide the directional changes of Mind-Assistant.

; export default PrivacyComponent;
